titleStmt.title: The famous historie of the renouned and valiant Prince Robert surnamed the Bruce King of Scotland e&. [sic] & of sundrie other valiant knights both Scots and English. A historye both pleasant and profitable set forthe and done in heroik verse by Patrick Gordon Gentleman.
